title: Who Killed John O'Neill?
overview: Traumatized by the September 11th attacks, one man struggles to dismantle official history, at the expense of his sanity and even his life. Grappling with multiple realities - and multiple personalities - he must retreat into his mind in pursuit of the truth. In a fictional film about non-fictional events, there is a place where belief and faith will blind you, where nothing is sacred, and to get there all you have to do is ask: "Who Killed John O'Neill?"

title: Mr. Soul
overview: A serial killer preys on prostitutes from the mean streets of a small, mid-west city as the police turn a blind eye. With an insatiable sexual appetite, the killer brutalizes his victims and leaves their bodies at Moon Lake outside of town. A voice inside the killer's head commands him to kill, his victims beg for death. John Martin Crawford is only too happy to oblige. But Moon Lake happens to be a spiritual holy ground for the local Native Americans, and soon the victims' ghosts are haunting both family members and complete strangers in desperate pleas for justice so their souls may rest. A supernatural story that reminds us the dead are not powerless.

title: Frolf: The Movie
overview: We explore the growing phenomenon of Frisbee Golf through the lives of several different competitors making their way to a tournament. The beloved sport is in jeopardy with thieves stealing their disc catcher targets. Paul Springfield must go undercover to find out who the frisbee golf thief is.

title: Townies
overview: NY Irish gang saga.

title: Luce nell'ombra
overview: Alessandro is a young southern Italian boy belonging to a clan of the infamous criminal organization 'Camorra'. Within a few days, his life changes completely: his best friend, after a wild motorcycle ride to escape the police after an attempted grand theft, dies. Alessandro learns the tragic news directly from the boss of his clan who, at the same time, puts him under loyalty test: Alessandro must kill the boss of the rival clan in order to gain final control of the territory. Alessandro is puzzled. In this situation, can a casual meeting with a priest of the same 'neighborhood' spare the life of this young man from a life of criminality and despair?

title: Jesse James: Legend, Outlaw, Terrorist
overview: One of the most controversial figures in U.S. history, Jesse James has captured the imagination of the world for more than a century. Teen guerilla fighter, Civil War soldier, notorious bandit, James holds a place in popular legend like no other. Through expert accounts, historic analysis and forensic science, this revealing exposé traces the outlaw's life from his humble Southern childhood through his rise to infamy and his mysterious death.

title: Hydra
overview: Four beautiful women con drug dealers out of their money.
tagline: Being conned never felt so good.

title: The Assassin
overview: Assassin John Brown, a heroin-addicted, recent war veteran, is hired to take out a local nightclub owner. When Brown slips, he finds himself on the run from both police and the shadowy corporation that hired him.

title: Rupture
overview: One man is tested to breaking point as the repercussions of a single fearsome choice lead him down a path of unbearable darkness, from which there can be no coming back. Some things taken can never be returned. Some things broken, never mended.

title: Tony
overview: Dour and awkward recluse Tony lives by himself in a shabby London flat. Friendless and socially maladroit, Tony brings strangers back to his flat and kills them. This 2005 short film became the basis of the 2009 feature of the same name.

title: Detroit
overview: A revolution stirs when a gang of frustrated rebels plots urban mayhem for the citizens and cops of Detroit. Opposing factions of thugs, police and residents search for their own ways of coping with the misery of violence, racial tension and poverty.

title: Suitable for Murder
overview: Joe Mondragon, a veteran cop who gets things done, forms an unlikely partnership with Samantha Baines. She is attached to Police Intelligence Division and feels more comfortable handling a computer than a gun. Samantha's computer skills are needed to help hack into and track two serial killers who get their victims from Internet Chat Rooms. The plan goes horribly wrong and in a fire fight between Samantha and Joe, and the two killers, Joe is killed when Samantha is unable to make herself fire her weapon at the two serial killers. Samantha feels guilty and responsible. With the help of her new friend Mimi, and the Head of Homicide, Samantha reinvents herself and avenges Joe after a relentless chase of the killers.

title: Parasite
overview: Jock Van Rysell is a middle age psychiatrist on the verge of a nervous breakdown. When a parasitic male patient of his interrupts his comfortable life, his sanity is literally flushed down the toilet.

title: Faithful Friends
overview: According to Bogdan Novak's literary proposition, Franc Arko wrote a script and shot an action crime "Faithful Friends". In it main hero Uros and his friends find bold robbers a little before the holidays and thus fall into the center of a criminal affair. Because Uros' neighbor decides to quiet down the young, and everyone who helps them, they find themselves in great danger. The story tells of the problems of growing up, the power that is needed for courageous actions, comradeship, love and affection that can connect generations.

title: Vic Reeves Investigates... Jack the Ripper
overview: Vic Reeves' documentary about the Jack the Ripper case focusing on an examination of five suspects in the case.

title: Deliver
overview: Like a generation of viewers, I was profoundly affected by Deliverance.  But I have always been troubled by the hegemonic structures of gender proposed by Boorman and Dickey. Hence, my version is played by women: myself, Peggy Ahwesh, Jackie Goss, Su Friedrich, and Meredith Root, all experimental filmmakers who work as academics. While faithful to our respective male characters, we also play ourselves.  -- Jennifer Montgomery

title: The Pack
overview: Intoxicated by the illusory idea of ​​easy money, teenagers form a "pack". Their leader, Danila, is a young man with a strong inclination for violent adventure.

title: 7 Deadly Sins: Inside The Ecomm Cult
overview: Cults are real...this 'mockumentary' isn't. Godfather of Gore movies Herschell Gordon Lewis plays a detective who tells the story of the Ecomm Cult, operated by the polygamist Doctor Smoke.

title: Finding Jack the Ripper
overview: London, 1888. A killer known by the name of Jack the Ripper brutally murders five prostitutes. Though the killings make the world's headlines, the slayer's identity remains a mystery for over 120 years. But new evidence found by an international team of experts leads to a German sailor and to New York's Lower East Side...

title: Consequências
overview: Mario and Alice are inside a car driving to the airport for one more vacation. Although, Mario has to make one last drop at a client's before heading out. Alice questions him. She wants to know more. Who is this man by her side? Is she ready to find out?

title: B.T.K. The Worlds Most Elusive Serial Killer
overview: In 1974, a serial killer terrorised Wichita, Kansas. Known as the BTK Killer due to the method in which would Bind, Torture and Kill his victims, his killing spree lasted for 7 years in which time he murdered 8 victims indiscriminately. Although he regularly communicated with police via a series of letters, BTK mysteriously disappeared in 1979 and has not been heard from in over 25 years. Incredibly, in March 2004 he suddenly returned. This film tells the extraordinary story of one of the longest running serial killer cases in history.
tagline: The Worlds Most Elusive Serial Killer

title: Wrong Turn
overview: It shows the relationship between boys and girls, love and loyalty of friends. It shows how one careless mistake made by someone can change the lives of friends.

title: The Big Gun
overview: Ikuo receives a suspicious order from a client demanding him to manufacture ten guns in two months. After trial and error, the weapons are completed. But the client postpones the payment and orders 40 more.

title: Alain Kan, l'enfant maudit du rock
Uma Noite com Ela
overview: In a small elevator, a man and a woman prepare for a night out for two. And now? At night, anything can happen.

title: Deus Ex China
overview: The theft of a car connects the lives of a frustrated musician and his girlfriend, a couple of police officers, two detectives and a pair of drug dealers, leading to the discovery of outcome a large sum of money from a Chinese drug lord.
tagline: To understand the absurd reality, sometimes you have to turn to see the ridiculous fiction

title: War Crimes
overview: After graduating college a group of friends from the UK decide to take a trip to the Balkans. Little did they know that a war was about to break out. As the fighting spreads to the city of Sarajevo they must escape for their lives through the countryside. After witnessing a massacre in Bosnia they are detected and pursued by a ruthless Yugoslav People s Army Officer and his brutal fighters. With limited supplies winter approaching and murderous special armed forces chasing them down will they ever make it home alive?

title: Detroit Mob Confidential
overview: Detroit Mob Confidential explores the history of Detroit's La Cosa Nostra Family, which, in many ways, is the most successful crime family in the United States. Detroit's family has had only 2 Dons, the current boss has served for 30 years and is the longest serving mob Don in America. The documentary consists of interviews with multiple FBI agents and Federal prosecutors as well as several mafia associates from the 1950's and 1960's. Topics such as the Detroit "Combination's" (as the Family is known) infiltration of Las Vegas casinos and their centrality to the disapearance of Jimmy Hoffa are discussed.

title: The Castback
overview: Cena is with a girl from the same university who wanted to get married when she was a student, but they could not, and after 5 years they see each other at the airport, and Cena forcibly goes to the girl's house and the girl hits Cena on the head with a stick and sends her to the hospital. And Sina's wife finds out about the story and their lives fall apart and the girl does not want her husband to know about this case and for this reason she makes a lot of jokes that her husband finally understands and decides to divorce but Sina's all He explains things to her and they go on with their lives.

title: Murderess
overview: If Winnie shot her two friends in self defense as she later claimed, why did she hide their bodies in trunks and attempt to take them as luggage with her on a train to L.A.?

title: Banzai Motherfucker!
overview: At a party, Lars is introduced to the drug dealer, Waylon. This is the start of a journey filled with drugs, violence and death.

title: Ronin  Boys
overview: Newly initiated into a powerful society of Asian gangsters, Evan's tame corporate days are over...

title: The Session Is Open
overview: Acclaimed documentarist Vincenzo Marra's work This Session Is Open constitutes an exercise in cinema direct filmmaking at its purest. Sans narration or any discernible viewpoint, the picture remains stringently objective in its inside portrayal of an Italian courtroom, during the assassination trial of a mafia unit called the 'Neapolitan Camorra.'

title: L'ombre du crime
overview: The Inspector (Youssef) and his colleague Morad begin to investigate the attempt to unravel the mystery of the five crimes. Ibelieving that this is a complex series of crimes. However, as the investigation progresses, doubts begin to arise regarding the possible involvement of his colleague Murad in this series of crimes. Is he really the real criminal? Was he able to mislead justice?  Or is the offender free outside ?

title: Nug
overview: A crime story told in reverse.

title: BloodWork: The Ana Mendieta Story
overview: In 1985, the artist Ana Mendieta fell naked, thirty-four floors, from the window of her apartment in New York City. The only person with her at the time was her husband of only eight months, the renowned sculptor and art world celebrity, Carl Andre. Was her fall an accident, suicide or murder? "BloodWork' is the first film to address this controversial subject.

title: City of Fraud
overview: The film aims to create a desire to live in a just society, not under the power, corruption, and bribery of officials that still exist in today's society, and to show the talent, strength, and courage of young people expressing their opinions through film events.

title: The Love Dog
overview: Originally conceived as the film for government propaganda but couldn't pass the censorship. Five punks found Dong Jianguo, a millionaire wearing the dog chain being trapped in the trunk. They kidnapped the millionaire and started to konw the love story between Dong Jianguo and a woman called Bobo.

title: Fiker Siferd
overview: A sequel to the most successful Ethiopian film of all-time, Theodros Teshome's Kezkaza Welafen (2003). Starring Teshome himself as Ali, a cop trying to catch a serial rapist-killer, whilst in a long-term relationship with Joanna (Martha Adugna). Like the first movie, Fiker Siferd deals with a kind of horrifying, anxiety-ridding issue facing modern Ethiopians: violence against women.
tagline: WHEN LOVE JUDGES, ONLY THE TRUTH IS ENOUGH

title: Seven Dead Men
overview: Seven Dead Men tells the tale of a caper gone awry. A pair of brothers, Steve and Carl, tired of their place in the world, hatch a plot against local crime boss Peter. Little do they know that their fence Johnny's big mouth and lies are about to get him in trouble with a lot more than Claire, his part-time girlfriend. Meanwhile, Jack and Petey have some unfinished business to settle. However, the schemes backfire and doom those involved.

title: Premiers Doutes
overview: Jean est marié à Chase depuis des années mais elle s'ennuie avec lui. Elle entame une relation par internet avec Travis, qu'elle n'a jamais rencontré. Un jour, elle accepte un lunch mais arrivée chez lui, elle découvre qu'il est mort, la gorge tranchée...

title: Qian yan wan yu
overview: Refreshingly simplistic and visually authentic, this film is set in 1973 Singapore and tells the story of 2 star-crossed teen-aged lovers against the backdrop of the underworld. A romantic tragedy reminiscent of films produced by Shaw Brothers studios during the golden era of Chinese cinema in the 70's, the film is dedicated to the memory of 70's Asian icon and diva, Teresa Teng (1953 -1995).

production_companies.name: Ngee Ann Polytechnic, School of Film & Media Studies

title: Mud Boy
overview: A traumatized young girl makes the chilling discovery that her missing brother has been buried in a shallow grave at the bottom of her garden. And yet he seems to be still alive

title: Rip Wack
overview: Two stoners get in trouble with authority.

title: Darker Every Day
overview: Where addiction & obsession meet

title: Karim
overview: 'Karim' tells the tale of a troubled boy who finds himself trapped in a world where fear, violence and abuse surround him, preying on his every thought and action. The film follows Karim on a day that will forever change his life, culminating in a sad and truly unforgettable moment.

title: Astig
overview: Short film spinoff of CONFESSIONAL featuring one of the minor characters.

title: Хроника столичных воров
overview: Молодые люди, Оля и Женя, едут автостопом в Москву. У них одна цель: сделать загранпаспорта и уехать, куда подальше… Вероятно они были замешаны в криминальной истории, так как паспорта они делают нелегально.

title: The Umbrella Assassin
overview: Georgi Markov's death by poisoned umbrella in 1978 remains unsolved, but it is thought the Bulgarian dissident writer was silenced by the KGB.

title: Section 753.2
overview: In 1999, Richard Condo, a man with an already extensive criminal record, was arrested in Ottawa and charged with a slew of criminal charges which event ally resulted in a Dangerous Offender Application under the Criminal Code of Canada, Section 753. After having been found NOT to be a Dangerous Offender, Richard Condo was given an 8-year prison sentence to be followed by a 10-year supervision order as a long term offender, Section 753.2. At his release from prison in July of 2006, Richard Condo faced extensive media coverage and with the many adversities, stigmas and stereotypes associated with his past, he had to deal with a system that labeled him a certain failure. Inspired by true events, it is the story of a man given a second chance at life and how he responded to the adversities thrown at him to answer the ultimate question: Is there redemption for such a man?

title: Taxi Drive Podgorica
overview: A news reporter interviews taxi drivers of Podgorica about their bizarre encounters with customers.

title: A Walking Shadow
overview: In the dark and rainy streets of Nashville, a hired assassin prowls the night. After he pick pocket a driver, he steals his car and drives around waiting for the perfect opportunity to strike. Shot in black and white as an homage to film noir and the French New Wave, this film is a thrilling tribute to classic cinema.

title: Assalto em Luanda
overview: The story of King and Talibam, two poor and unemployedbrothers from Luanda who, wanting to change their lives, decide to become robbers.

title: Carrion
overview: An alcoholic detective is thrown into a weird vortex of the occult, as he investigates a sinister church controlled by the vicious black pope. Watch in horror, as the detective tries to stop virgin sacrifices, lunatic lesbians, and shape-shifting monsters.

title: Amok
overview: A docu-fiction re-imagining of the Cologne school shooting in the 1960s.

title: The Night of Storm
overview: A dead body without a head was found in the village, which brought a nervous atmosphere to the peaceful village, and the villagers talked about it. At this time, there was a new head of township An from the army. He was an upright and responsible person. As soon as he arrived in the village, he started investigating the headless case. Deputy Mayor Xu enthusiastically introduced the various situations in the village to Mayor An.

title: Punisher: Hell Tickets
overview: Punisher has a chance to finally caught and kill the true killer of his wife and son. Help will suddenly arrive in Nick Fury... This is tirst Croatian Fan Film based upon a Marvel Comic Book "The Punisher".

title: O Bom, O Mau e O Vilão
Tuesday
overview: Tuesday explores a moment when responsibility and culpability share a thin line after a man leaves the scene of an accident and begins to fall apart from the ensuing guilt. Little does he know that there is more to what happened than what he thinks.
tagline: Your life can change in an instant but how it changes can depend on how much you know.

title: Street Stars: The Alpo Story
overview: With his buddies AZ and Rich Porter, Alpo rose to become one of New York’s top drug kingpins in the 1980s. This documentary traces the life and career of the young man dubbed the unofficial “Mayor of Harlem.” Business smarts and hard work led to street fame and enormous fortune for the friends, but when flashy Porter neglected to pay money he owed to the more unassuming Alpo, the rift in their partnership led to betrayal, murder and prison.Eagerly anticipated story about the most popular guy in the most trend-setting part of the world…Harlem. As a young boy growing up in Harlem, Alpo and his friends (AZ & Rich Porter) took advantage of a power vacuum in the drug game after the head kingpins from the ’70s were either killed or incarcerated. Through business savvy (offering the lowest drug prices in town), hard work, and charismatic public relations Alpo became the unofficial “Mayor of Harlem”. Watch as ambition turns to greed, which leads to murder.
tagline: The drug game wasn't personal, it was business.

title: Last Hand
overview: When his confidence scheme backfires, Rick finds himself in trouble -- the kind of trouble he can't run away from. He is forced by a Russian Mafia boss to play one hand of poker, with the prize being his girlfriend's life. Caught between the boss's bodyguard and hired gun, Rick has more than one job to pull off. E

title: The Match
overview: In a Dutch village, an eighty-year-old widow is murdered. The perverted modus operandi turns the crime into a national media event. It made the authorities decide to set up one of the first large-scale DNA investigations in the country. The men who were interrogated and investigated by the police are interrogated once again for the film and have to describe the dramatic events and try to put their feelings into words.
tagline: How for the first time a Dutch murder was solved by large-scale DNA testing

title: Ynomitset YM
overview: A journey backwards to last moments of life from the point of view of a corpse.

title: The Kidnappers
overview: A highly elliptical and tense story about an abduction, set in the Blue Mountains in NSW.

title: Sleep to Dream
overview: Rachel has a blackout, waking to find herself smothering her boyfriend, Jack to death. By the time she realizes what she has done it is too late. Rachel flees the scene of the crime, ending up at a hotel on the other side of Chicago. Once she has gotten settled, the phone rings. The caller claims to be a witness to the crime. This witness has been watching Rachel for a long time and doesn't plan to let her off easy.

title: Spade: The Last Assignment
overview: SPADE: THE LAST ASSIGNMENT is a new feature film (by Oliver Mbamara) about the career/adventures of Special Agent Spade, who goes on a last assignment to crack an international syndicate engaged in women trafficking and smuggling of African artifacts

title: A Sheherazade Tale
overview: A young man in Beirut's crime-ridden underbelly tells the story of his death.

title: A Conversation with Mr. D
overview: MR. D is a killer. A cold, calculating, brutal gun for hire. A rising star in the Mafia, he is sent from his home in New York to the suburban home of Chris and Genie Richardson, to take care of some urgent business. Unfortunately, the mark isn't home and Genie Richardson is left all alone with Mr. D and his gun.

title: Happiness The Bad Boy
overview: The film is set in the 1980s. Oyuunaa, a student who gave birth to a fatherless child, leaves her son at the door of a stranger in order to study and live. At this time, while running away from drunken youths, Tsogoo finds the child, brings him home, names him "Azjargal" and adopts him as her own son. However, Oyuunaa's mother, who many years later becomes a world-famous singer, tells the complicated story of her return to her homeland and meeting her son.

title: Murder in Paradise
overview: The Bahamas in 1943 was the setting for one of the greatest unsolved crimes of the 20th century. This film reveals the findings of a five-year investigation into the murder of Sir Harry Oakes.

title: Sutura
overview: Documentary commissioned by the International Center for Ethics, Justice and Public Life at Brandeis University on sexual abuse and justice in Senegal, in collaboration with the Senegalese Women Lawyers Association and the West African Research Center in Dakar.

title: A Day in Life of 007
overview: This is my second Lego movie on Youtube, showing one of the few days when 007 is not on duty.

title: End Time
overview: His seemingly hopeless situation and abysmal hatred turns the nameless nobody into a human time bomb.
tagline: The end is coming. It's only a matter of time.

title: Almaty Skylines
overview: One late evening, three friends meet, having not seen each other for a long time, they remember the old days, and set off at night in search of adventures around the city of Almaty, not suspecting what awaits them...

title: Exsecratus
overview: A group of young people accidentally kill a 12-year-old boy while driving. They decide to bury the child to cover up their mistake, but slowly the past catches up with them, as the child begins to haunt them.
tagline: No one can run from the past...

title: Balls Alley
overview: An urban romantic drama with a gangster flavour

title: Orphan
overview: Crime drama about an orphan

title: Charlie Chan’s Courage: A Re-Creation of a Lost Chan Film
overview: A re-construction of the lost Charlie Chan's Courage.

title: ملكية خاصة
overview: The first Egyptian short film to discuss the issue of harassment in Egypt
tagline: أول فيلم في مصر يناقش قضية التحرش

title: Little People
overview: Gaziboy wins the car in the lottery. He takes a lot of money from his father and goes to town.

title: Die Würchwitzer Olsenbande auf der Suche nach dem Bernsteinzimmer
Didi and Gigi
overview: Close as two crossed fingers, twins Didi and Gigi set for fame and fortune as their modelling career takes off. Didi meets love while her sister's career is cut short by an accident. Jealousy, fury and passion leads Gigi to extreme measures
